short_summary: Dredging of 8,100m3 of material and disposal at an approved waste disposal site
description: The scope of work consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material for channel and basin dredging at Branch, NL, in strict accordance with the specifications and accompanying drawings, and subject to all terms and conditions of the Contract*
full_summary:
**Title**: Redragage, Branch, Newfoundland and Labrador

**Tender Information**

* **Reference Number**: cb-475-30784555
* **Publication Date**: 2024-07-11
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-25T14:00:00
* **Note**: The tender has expired.

**Scope of Work**

The scope of work for this Invitation to Qualify is the furnishing of all necessary plant, labor, equipment, and materials for channel and basin dredging at Branch, NL, in accordance with the specifications and accompanying drawings. The objective is to dredge approximately 8,100m3 of material and dispose of it at an approved waste disposal site.

**Key Dates**

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-08-12
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2025-03-30

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Procurement Category**: Construction Services (CNST)

**Contact Information**

* **Contact Name**: Dina Al-Eryani
* **Contact Email**: Dina.Al-Eryani@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* **Contact Telephone**: 506-282-2340

**Attachments**

* [Technical Specification Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42056/30005916---rfq.pdf) (English)
* [Spécification Technique Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/42056/30005916---ddq.pdf) (French)
